org.apache.twill.api

Interface ElectionHandler


  • public interface ElectionHandler
    Handles events of election/un-election of leader.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void follower()
      This method will get invoked when a participant is a follower in a leader election process.
      void leader()
      This method will get invoked when a participant becomes a leader in a leader election process.

    • Method Detail

      • leader

        void leader()
        This method will get invoked when a participant becomes a leader in a leader election process. It is guaranteed that this method won't get called consecutively (i.e. called twice or more in a row).

      • follower

        void follower()
        This method will get invoked when a participant is a follower in a leader election process. This method might get called multiple times without the leader() method being called.
